Ref: CXP029/2023

Required to purchase goods, materials, components, or services in line with specified cost, quality, lead-times and HSE protocols. Provide procurement support and purchase goods for relevant office/division following Procurement and Vendor Control procedure.

Location: Modderfontein or Chloorkop, Johannesburg
Salary: R30 000 – R32 000 tctc
Industry: Water Management, Waste Management and Energy Services

Main Duties include:

•Handle the RFQ processes; prepare compliant and outstanding purchase orders and reports; and confirm contract and price queries for the division and relevant categories.

•Participate actively in the supplier’s selection and undertake performance reviews.

•Ensure that the goods/services purchased are at the best TCO & contract conditions.

•Negotiate contracts with suppliers to make business savings and meet savings plan

•Ensure that the goods & services purchased are in accordance with the Purchase Requisition.

•Administering the LATIS/SAP By design ERP System.

•Assist in sourcing products/services and evaluating new vendors.

•Ensure that the Group Contracts Management procedure is followed.

•Establish and maintain an approved vendor list  with the Management representatives.

•Confirming contract and price queries

•File all records to enable quick and easy access.

•Adhere to all Company policies and procedures.

•Ensure total confidentiality of all information, internal and external, pertaining to the business of the Company, all its Employees and Management.

Criteria:

•Relevant Manufacturing or Engineering Diploma or Degree preferred.

•Procurement/ Logistics / Supply Chain Management Certificate (NQF6), Diploma or Degree.

•Member of Chartered Institute of Procurement & Supply (CIPS) – advantageous

•Five years minimum experience in Buying/Procurement.

•Computer literate (Google sheet/Excel, Google docs/Word) with speed and accuracy.

•Competence with ERP software, especially Oracle/JD Edwards or SAP is an advantage.

•Good communication and negotiations skills
